$$
\sum_{i=1}^{m}{\sum_{j=1}^{n}{f(x_i, y_j)\ \Delta A}}
$$

```{r pag_977}
f = function(x,y) { 16-x^2-2*y^2 }
R = c(0, 2, 0, 2)
m = 256
n = 256
dA = (R[2]-R[1])/m * (R[4]-R[3])/n
i_seq = seq(R[1], R[2], length.out=m+1)
i_seq = i_seq[i_seq>R[1]]
j_seq = seq(R[3], R[4], length.out=n+1)
j_seq = j_seq[j_seq>R[3]]
A = 0
for (i in i_seq) {
  for (j in j_seq) {
    A = A + f(i,j)*dA
  }
}
A
```
